site-description: Engage and Retain your guests with location aware technology.

content.title: what is traily
content.description:
Since the hype from Pokemon Go in 2016, geoloaction apps have soared in interest.
Local businesses have been trying to get themselves 'on the map' and we have been helping them.

Until now it has felt like a very seperated approach with local businesses asking us to create an app that would allow their customers to participate in a unique trail.

After creating numerous apps we felt there needed to be a unified approach that allowed businesses to create their own branded trails and offer it to their own clients, without the need for creating an individual app everytime.

And so, traily was born.

content.title: No access to Real Time Data
content.description:
A major challenge faced by Tourist Boards is the delay between visits and obtaining metrics.
Often metrics are only available months later through surveys and questionairres sent via post.
Traily allows you to create surveys that can be taken by your guests at the site for a more accurate representation of user sentiment.

content.title: Visitor Retention
content.description: Static printed trails offer no extra value when a user visits the location. </br>The visitor experience to your trail should be engaging. </br>Use Traily to encourage your guests to interact by sharing with friends and family. Engage your guests by offering supplementary content to enhance your Trail POIs.

content.title: Outdated Print
content.description: Don't waste money on outdated print. </br>Update the details of your trail in our CMS and the new details are available instantly to all guests.

content.title: tourism metrics
content.description:
Almost 85 percent of tourists use smartphones while abroad.
30 percent of travelers found accommodation via smartphones
72 percent of post-vacation photos end up on social networks
15 percent of leisure travelers download tourism apps prior to their trips

content.title: Place Discovery
content.description:
Traily makes your trails and POIs more attractive to guests by providing supplementary content that can be accessed when at the location.
Increase dwell time and user spend by engaging you guests at the location.

content.title: Social Sharing
content.description: Traily allows your guests to share to their family and friends when they are at one of your trail POIs. </br>

content.title: Offline First App
content.description: Not all of your POIs will be in an area where a inernet connection is available. </br>The offline experience is seamless and any interactions with the app while offline will be synced to the backend service once a network connection is reestablished. </br>Mark certain POIs as network blackspots within the CMS and the app will pre-download content for offline access at these locations.

content.title: Content Managment System
content.description: Fully control your trail data and create new trails directly from within the app or from a secured web interface. </br>Increase dwell time by adding relevant content (images/videos) that your guests can engage with when at the location.

content.title: Real Time User Data
content.description: With traily you can be reactive to data trends by accessing up to the minute metrics on what your guests are doing. Want to know where your guests go when its a sunny day? Want to provide neighboring businesses with footfall metrics so they can optimise their opening hours? With Traily these questions and many more can be answered.

content.title: Visitor Retention
content.description: By engaging your guests with supplementary content, unlocked by physically being at a location, Traily increases user engagement with you trail. </br>This leads to increased dwell time and ultimately, increased user spend.

content.title: create
content.description:
traily allows businesses to create as many trails as they want within their own branding area of an app.

It's simple, intuitive and quick.

1. give the trail a name
2. create a trail point
3. add content and media
